title: Hybrid Project-Based Learning for Understanding and Practicing Climate Change Mitigation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge (Earth Systems, Ecosystems) and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on developing climate change education methodologies applicable in elementary settings and integrating field practice. Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Present three or more case studies explaining the scientific causes and social impacts of climate change
Design and implement climate change education projects for elementary learners using PBL (Project-Based Learning)
Develop community-applicable climate action plans achieving over 80% participant satisfaction

resources: Climate Education Kit for Teachers (Includes Recycled Materials)
Local Environmental Data Collection Tool (Simple Measuring Devices)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
